description:
Goro used his new karma-twisting powers to resurrect Honoka. The two of them form an alliance along with his friend and fellow God candidate Akitsu, and Honoka provides them with an explanation of some of the details of their new status as candidates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitsu ga Tsuyoi toka, Yowai toka
Is He Strong, Is He Weak?
あいつが強いとか, 弱いとか
